required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Higher Dose of Alglucosidase Alpha for Pompe Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Higher Dose of Alglucosidase Alpha for Pompe Disease: Long-term Follow-up Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study is aimed to investigate that whether the higher dose ERT improve safety and clinical outcomes of Pompe disease patients. Also, wish to develop a new therapeutic recommendation and hope that it could improve the long-term outcomes of Pompe diesease patients.

primary_outcome.time_frame: For patient older than 3-year-old, first test before study, then every six months, up to 2-years.
primary_outcome.description: Pulmonary function test (Units: percentage of predictive value)

primary_outcome.time_frame: For patient older than 3-year-old, first test before study, then every six months, up to 2-years.
primary_outcome.description: Pulmonary function test (Units: percentage of predictive value)

primary_outcome.time_frame: For patient older than 6-month-old, first test before study, then every six months, up to 2-years.
primary_outcome.description: Comprehensive test used to diagnose sleep disorders.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: uGLC4 will be tested before the treatment, then every three months, up to 2-years.
CK will be tested before the treatment, then every three months, up to 2-years.
secondary_outcome.description: Blood creatine kinase (Units: units per liter, U/L).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: AST will be tested before the treatment, then every three months, up to 2-years.
secondary_outcome.description: Blood aspartate aminotransferase (Units: units per liter, U/L).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: ALT will be tested before the treatment, then every three months, up to 2-years.
secondary_outcome.description: Blood alanine aminotransferase (Units: units per liter, U/L).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The body weight will be monitored before the treatment, then every two weeks, up to 2-years.
secondary_outcome.description: Change of body weight (Unit: kilogram, kg)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The body height will be monitored before the treatment, then every two weeks, up to 2-years.
secondary_outcome.description: Change of body height (Units: centimeter, cm)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First test will be one month later after first ERT, then every six months, up to 2-years.

intervention.description: Standard dose: 20-25 mg/kg every other week; Higher dose: >25 mg/kg every other week.

study_pop.textblock: The observational population included patients of Pompe disease who were diagnosed and treated in our series.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Diagnosis of Pompe disease
2. Currently receiving ERT with regular clinic visits
3. Agree to sign informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Lost follow-up for clinical visits
2. Allergy to Myozyme
3. Refuse to sign informed consent
